sourceDesc.p: A thoroughly elaborated txt version of Dillmann, Christian Friedrich August. Lexicon linguae aethiopicae, cum indice latino. Adiectum est vocabularium tigre dialecti septentrionalis compilatum a W. Munziger. Lipsiae: Th.O. Weigel, 1865.

encodingDesc.p: A digital edition of the Lexicon in TEI.

revisionDesc.change: updated txt file and doc file of Lexicon
last updated txt file and doc file of Lexicon
updated lexicon XML file adding nested senses

entry.sense:
adv. rel. , praep. , conj. [כְּמוֹ, כְּמָא, ܐܰܟܡܳܐ, كَمَا; gramm. § 63, a; gramm. § 64, b], Adv. rel. integrae sententiae praemissum: ከመ፡ comparative: ut , sicut , quemadmodum , sive addito correlato ( sic , ita ): Sir. 3,15; Sir. 10,2; ከመ፡ ይፈቱ፡ ኅጽው፡ – ከማሁ፡ Sir. 20,4; Jes. 62,5; Jer. 3,20; Hen. 28,2; Eph. 5,24; Col. 3,13; 1 Thess. 5,2; sive omisso: Jes. 64,2; Jer. 50,12; Deut. 28,29; Gen. 41,2; Jud. 7,5; Am. 2,13; ከመ፡ ምስለ፡ አንስት፡ Lev. 18,22; ከመ፡ አመ፡ ንስቲታ፡ Lev. 22,13; Matth. 6,12; 2 Cor. 11,3. in specie: ከመ፡ – ከመዝ፡ quo ( magis ) – eo (major) Hen. 67,9. raro in oratione obliqua: quomodo vel quam , Hen. 41,1; Hen. 2,1; ነኪር፡ ከመ፡ ተዐቢ፤ ዕፁብ፡ ከመ፡ ታስተባሪ፡ Sir. 43,8. rarissime in exclamatione: quam! Hen. 32,5. በከመ፡ i.e. በ፡ et ከመ፡ (καθώς, fere crebrius usitatum, quam ከመ፡ ὡς) comparative: ut , sicut , quemadmodum , addito correlato: Gen. 6,22; Gen. 18,5; በከመ፡ ብዙኀ፡ ትነብብ፡ ከማሁ፡ ትሰምዕ፡ Job 11,2; Job 31,15; Prov. 17,3; Jes. 10,11; Jes. 14,24; 4 Esr. 10,18; 4 Esr. 10,19; Hen. 5,2; Matth. 24,38; Matth. 24,39; Luc. 11,30; Luc. 17,26; Luc. 24,24; Joh. 3,14; Joh. 5,21; Joh. 15,4; 2 Cor. 10,7; Gal. 6,22; omisso correlato: Gen. 7,9; Gen. 33,14; Gen. 41,13; Gen. 41,54; Gen. 44,2; Ex. 8,9; Ex. 8,27; Jos. 8,8; Jos. 8,27; Ps. 102,11; Ps. 102,12; Matth. 6,10; Matth. 8,13; Marc. 10,1; Rom. 9,25; Hebr. 3,11; 2 Cor. 8,6. in specie: በከመ፡ – ከማሁ፡ quo
magis – eo
magis Hos. 10,1; Hos. 11,2. raro: quomodo , ut Hen. 5,1. ዘከመ፡ et ከመ፡ እንተ፡ et እንተ፡ ከመ፡ (i.e. pron. rel. et ከመ፡) sicut , quemadmodum : ኵሎ፡ ዘከመ፡ ትቤልኒ፡ እገብር፡ Ruth 3,5; 1 Reg. 16,4; ኵሉ፡ ዘከመ፡ κατὰ πάντα ὅσα 4 Reg. 16,11; Gen. 27,4; Jos. 9,23; 4 Esr. 10,61; Hen. 1,1; Hen. 12,4; Hen. 27,4; Hen. 27,5; ዘከመ፡ መሀርኩክሙ፡ ከማሁ፡ ተዓቀቡ፡ 1 Cor. 11,2; ከመ፡ እንተ፡ ታስተጋብእ፡ ዶርሆ፡ Matth. 23,37; Matth. 24,27. – Nonnumquam ከመዘ፡, vid. infra sub B. I. 2. – quomodo : ታአምር፡ ዘከመ፡ ገብሩ፡ Kuf. 10; Ruth 3,4; ነገርክዎሙ፡ ዘከመ፡ ረድአኒ፡ 2 Esr. 12,18; Jes. 38,3; Ps. 9,13; 2 Reg. 14,3; Hen. 9,6; Joh. 12,49; 1 Thess. 1,9; ኵሉ፡ ምክሩ፡ ዘከመ፡ ያጠነቅቅ፡ ኀሪወ፡ ማኅተም፡ Sir. 38,27 seq.; epexegetice: Ex. 18,8; Zeph. 2,8; 2 Esr. 12,17; Hen. 9,6. De ዘከመ፡ እፎ፡ (et እንተ፡ ከመ፡ እፎ፡ Num. 13.18) vid. sub እፎ፡ Singulis nominibus praemissum Praepositionis vice fungitur (nam rarissimae sunt tales constructiones qualis est እነግረከ፡ ከመ፡ ብእሴ፡ 4 Esr. 10,48 var.). Ubi pronomia suffiguntur, forma primaria ከማ፡ recipitur ( gramm. § 167,2), ut: ከማየ፡ Jes. 45,21; Jes. 47,10; ከማነ፡ Jes. 14,10; ከማክሙ፡ Job 12,3; ከማክን፡ 4 Esr. 2,45; ከማከ፡ Ps. 44,9; Ps. 88,9; ከማሁ፡ Ex. 9,18; 1 Reg. 20,30; ከማሃ፡ Jer. 37,7; ከማሆሙ፡ Hebr. 4,11. ከመ፡ ut , sicut , instar , tamquam , vel per adj. similis vertendum: Gen. 3,5; Gen. 9,3; Gen. 13,16; Gen. 22,17; Lev. 19,18; Deut. 4,32; Jos. 10,2; Jud. 8,18; Jud. 9,36; Ps. 1,3; Ps. 1,5; 1 Reg. 25,36; Matth. 10,16; Matth. 21,46; Luc. 17,24; 2 Cor. 6,8; 2 Cor. 6,9; 1 Petr. 1,14; 1 Petr. 1,19; 1 Petr. 1,24; 1 Petr. 2,2; 1 Petr. 2,5; 1 Petr. 2,16; Apoc. 1,10 al., post verba comparandi Matth. 14,5; vid. መሰለ፡ c. deriv.; ὅμοιος ሰብእ፡ ዘከማከ፡ Sir. 28,3; Sir. 28,4; Sir. 30,4; Ps. 44,9; Job 35,8; ዘከማሁ፡ ὁ ἴσος αὐτῷ Job 41,3; ዐባይ፡ ይእቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ወአልቦ፡ ዘከማሃ፡ Jer. 37,7. raro: circiter , Matth. 14,21 (aliâs መጠነ፡, የአክል፡). በከመ፡ secundum (de norma et convenientia), juxta , pro , κατά, Lev. 18,3; Num. 14,19; (በከመ፡ ስሙ፡ ከማሁ፡ እበዲሁ፡ 1 Reg. 25,25); 2 Reg. 22,21; Ps. 7,9; Ps. 17,23; Ps. 17,27; Ps. 27,5; Ps. 27,6; Ps. 50,1; Ps. 50,2; Ps. 102,10; Prov. 26,4; Prov. 26,5; Job 34,11; Jer. 6,19; በከመ፡ ቃልክሙ፡ Jer. 49,4; ጥበብ፡ በከመ፡ ስማ፡ ይእቲ፡ Sir. 6,22; በከመ፡ ክብሩ፡ ያገብኡ፡ ሎቱ፡ ፍትሐ፡ Sir. 8,14; Sir. 11,26; Hebr. 5,6; Hebr. 5,10; Apoc. 22,12. ዘከመ፡ et ከመ፡ እንተ፡ secundum , juxta , ad
modum : እመ፡ ብከ፡ ብእሲተ፡ ዘከመ፡ ነፍስከ፡ Sir. 7,26; Gen. 5,3; Ps. 19,4; 1 Reg. 13,14; Act. 13,22; ከመ፡ እንተ፡ ወይጠል፡ 1 Par. 12,8; Ex. 21,9. Compositum cum Pron. rel. : ከመዘ፡ et ከመ፡ እንተ፡ sequente integra sententia: quasi , tamquam
si : Gen. 19,14; ወኮነ፡ ከመ፡ ዘአልቦ፡ ዘቦአ፡ et erat quasi nihil intras
s
et Gen. 41,21; Gen. 42,30; Jud. 14,6; ከመ፡ ዘይረድአከ፡ ያቴሕት፡ ርእሶ፡ ታሕተ፡ ሰኰናከ፡ Sir. 12,17; ከመ፡ ዘይሥሕቅ፡ ምስሌከ፡ የሐትተከ፡ Sir. 13,11; Sir. 20,15 (c. Perf.); እመኒ፡ ሞተ፡ አቡሁ፡ ከመ፡ ዘኢሞተ፡ Sir. 30,4; Act. 3,12; Jac. 2,12; Herm. p. 97. sequentibus singulis nominibus: tamquam , Num. 14,15; አስተርአየ፡ ለነ፡ (Deus) ከመ፡ እንተ፡ ንስር፡ ዐቢይ፡ Rel. Bar.; ረሰይዎ፡ (ለእብን፡) ከመ፡ እንተ፡ ማዕጾ፡ Rel. Bar.; ነሣእኩክሙ፡ ከመዘ፡ ክንፈ፡ ጒዛ፡ (sumsi vos tamquam si essent alae i.e. tamquam super alas) Ex. 19,4; Luc. 22,52; ከመ፡ ዘሰራቂ፡ (non ዘሰራቄ፡) ትዴግኑ፡ (ejus instar qui latro est i.e. tamquam latronem persecut
u
ri ) Matth. 26,55. i.q. ዘከመ፡ sicut , quemadmodum : ከመ፡ ዘ፡ – ከማሁ፡ Prov. 27,19; ይጼልዩ፡ ኀቤሁ፡ ከመዘ፡ ኀበ፡ አማልክት፡ Jes. 45,20. cum Pron. demonstr. (ዝ፡) et Pron. pers. suff. III pers. (ሁ፡ al.) Qua compositione circumscribitur adj. talis , tale , talia , sc. simplice ከመ፡ seq. pronomine. ከማሁ፡, τοιοῦτος 1 Cor. 15,48; Job 8,13; Job 8,19; በእንተ፡ ከማሁ፡ διὰ τοῦτο Ex. 15,23. ከመዝ፡ vel ከመ፡ ዝንቱ፡ Gen. 41,38;አኮ፡ ከመዝ፡ ነገሩ፡ ዘከመ፡ ትብል፡ 2 Esr. 16,8; Job 8,2; Job 8,18; 4 Esr. 6,4; Matth. 19,10; 1 Cor. 7,7. plerumque praemisso pron. rel. , ዘከመዝ፡ talis : መጽልእ፡ ዘከመዝ፡ ብእሲ፡ Sir. 20,15; ሕዝብ፡ ዘከመዝ፡ Jer. 9,9; Matth. 9,8; Matth. 18,5; Marc. 4,33; Act. 22,22; 1 Cor. 5,11; passim ዘ፡ vel ዝ፡ secundum genera et numeros variatis: እንተ፡ ከመ፡ ዛቲ፡ ብእሲት፡ γυναῖκα τοιαύτην Judith 12,12; እንተ፡ ከመዝ፡ Sir. 23,24; ለእለ፡ ከመዝ፡ τοιούτων Matth. 19,14; 1 Cor. 16,18; Phil. 2,29; 2 Thess. 3,12; ለዘከመ፡ እሉ፡ Marc. 10,14; 1 Cor. 16,16; passim ከመዝ፡ ad omnia genera numerosque relato: ዘከመዝ፡ τοιούτους Joh. 4,23; τοιαῦτα Job 16,2; እንዘቦ፡ ውስቴቶሙ፡ ዘከመዝ፡ አንስት፡ Judith 10,19; ዘከመዝ፡ ተኣምረ፡ Joh. 9,16; ዝሙት፡ ዘከመዝ፡ 1 Cor. 5,11; οὕτως Matth. 6,30. at ዘከማሁ፡ aut: similis ei (vid. sub A. II,1, a) aut: qualis Ex. 10,14; Marc. 9,3; Marc. 13,19; Act. 16,18. adv. ከመዝ፡ et ከማሁ፡ hoc vel eodem modo , ita , sic , pariter , ከማሁ፡ in sententiis correlativis: Gen. 6,22; Gen. 18,5; Ps. 102,13; Matth. 12,40; Matth. 13,40; Matth. 24,27; Matth. 24,37; Rom. 5,18; Rom. 5,19; Rom. 6,19; Luc. 11,2; etiam omisso correlato relativo: Sir. 18,16; Sir. 22,24; Luc. 17,10; Luc. 21,31; Jac. 2,17; Jac. 3,5. ከመዝ፡ et ከማሁ፡ relatum ad antecedentia: Ex. 6,9; ከመዝ፡ ወከመዝ፡ ረሰየኒ፡ Jud. 18,4; ኢኮነ፡ ከመዝ፡ 1 Reg. 20,2; ከመ፡ ከመዝ፡ ውእቱ፡ Job 9,2; 1 Reg. 23,17; ከመዝ፡ ይቤ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ Jer. 4,3 al.; Matth. 3,15; Matth. 5,12; Matth. 5,19; Marc. 15,39; Luc. 22,26; Rom. 1,32; Rom. 2,2; Rom. 12,16 (at Graece: τὸ αὐτό); ወከማሁ፡ ብእሲትኒ፡ Sir. 23,22; ወከማሁ፡ ὁμοίως Sir. 24,11; Jos. 6,15; Gen. 1,6; Gen. 1,9; Matth. 12,45; Luc. 9,15; Luc. 17,10; Luc. 21,31. ከመዝ፡ et ከማሁ፡ relatum ad sequentia: ከመዝ፡ Gen. 10,1; Gen. 36,1; Gen. 41,1; Hen. 14,8; Matth. 1,18; Matth. 6,9; ከማሁ፡ Matth. 2,5; seq. ከመ፡ vel እስከ፡ ut (daß) Matth. 5,16; 1 Petr. 3,1; (ከመዝ፡ – እስከ፡) Joh. 3,16. de አምጣነ፡ – ከማሁ፡ quo magis – eo magis vid. አምጣነ፡ col. 224; adde በአምጣነ፡ – ከማሁ፡ Sir. 3,18; Sir. 16,12; de በከመ፡ – ከማሁ፡ quo magis – eo magis vid. supra A I 2 a γ. ምስለ፡ ከመዝ፡ hoc non obstante Jes. 15,7; Am. 4,9; vid. ምስለ፡ col. 175. ከመዝ፡ tam , tantopere : ከመዝ፡ ፍጡነ፡ οὕτω ταχέως Gal. 1,6; ከመዝኑ፡ አብዳን፡ አንትሙ፡ Gal. 3,3; ከመዝ፡ ጠቢብ፡ 1 Cor. 6,5; 1 Joh. 4,11. ከማሁ፡ in responsione: sic , 4 Esr. 5,9 (soloecismus videtur). in interrogatione: ከመዝኑ፡ sicne?
num ita? Ex. 2,14; Matth. 26,40; Marc. 7,18; Joh. 18,22. Conj. ከመ፡ conj. relativa, quae Objecto (vel Subjecto) de quo agitur indicando vel alii praecedentis sententiae complemento annectendo inservit (ὅτι, daß), seq. Indic. Respondet Latinorum Acc. (Nom.) c. Infin., post verba sentiendi et declarandi, al.: ርእየት፡ ከመ፡ ሠናይ፡ ዕፅ፡ Gen. 3,6; ርእየ፡ ከመ፡ በዝኀ፡ Gen. 6,2; Gen. 16,4; Gen. 16,5; አእመረ፡ ከመ፡ ተነትገ፡ ማይ፡ Gen. 8,11; 2 Reg. 12,9; ሰምዐ፡ ከመ፡ ተፄወወ፡ Gen. 14,14; Gen. 29,33; መኑ፡ አይድዐከ፡ ከመ፡ ዕራቅከ፡ አንተ፡ Gen. 3,11; Gen. 12,18; Gen. 31,20; ይእመኑከ፡ ከመ፡ አስተርአየከ፡ Ex. 4,5; Job 9,16; Jac. 2,19; Jac. 2,20; Jac. 2,21; Jac. 2,22; መሐለ፡ ከመ፡ ኢያአምር፡ Matth. 26,72; ተዘከር፡ ከመ፡ መሬት፡ ንሕነ፡ Ps. 102,14; ትጤይቅ፡ ከመ፡ Job 5,25; ይመስለኒ፡ ከመ፡ Hen. 106,6; ኀለየ፡ ከመ፡ ጸውዖ፡ 1 Reg. 3,8; ኢትሰፈዉ፡ ከመ፡ ተሐይዉ፡ Hen. 9,8; Hen. 9,10; ሐሰወት፡ ከመ፡ ሠሐቀት፡ Kuf. 16; ኮኑ፡ ሰማዕተ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይጸድቁ፡ Rom. 3,22; ዝንቱ፡ ትእምርቱ፡ ከመ፡ ይገብር፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘንተ፡ ነገረ፡ Jes. 38,7; ከመ፡ ያስተርእዩ፡ ከመ፡ ጾሙ፡ Matth. 6,16; Matth. 6,18; ተዐውቀት፡ ከመ፡ ፀንሰት፡ Kuf. 41; ተብህለ፡ ከመ፡ Phlx. 72. Passim Subjectum sententiae subjunctae a verbo sententiae principalis tamquam Objectum attrahitur, ut: ሰምዕዎ፡ ከመ፡ ሀሎ፡ ውስተ፡ ቤት፡ Marc. 2,1; Matth. 25,24; Matth. 25,26; Gen. 1,4; Gen. 6,2; Gen. 12,14; Gen. 49,15; (vid. gramm. § 190). Ubi post verba sentiendi et declarandi ከመ፡ c. Subj. verbi sequitur, e C, I, 3, c illustrandum est. Sicut ὅτι (כִּי ܕ أَنْ), ከመ፡ recitationi verborum alterius ininservit (vel orationi directae praemittitur): Lev. 14,35; Jos. 5,6; 2 Reg. 21,17; Matth. 2,23; Matth. 21,16. quod , ad indicandam causam (quamquam minus frequentatum quam እስመ፡) post verba affectuum: ይትፌሣሕ፡ ከመ፡ ትጠፍኡ፡ Deut. 28,63; አንከሩ፡ ከመ፡ ረድአ፡ 2 Par. 26,15; et alia, ut: አስተዋደየኒ፡ ከመ፡ ቀበርክዎሙ፡ Tob. 1,19. crebro post እፎ፡, sc. እፎ፡ ከመ፡ qu
î ( est, ) quod i.e. quomodo evenit ut vid. sub እፎ፡ conj. consecutiva, ὥστε ut , ita ut , seq. Indic. ያንኅሎን፡ ለአህጉሪከ፡ ከመ፡ አልቦ፡ ዘይነብር፡ ውስቴቶን፡ Jer. 4,7; Jac. 2,5; Phil. 3,10 Platt; Hebr. 10,36; Gen. . 32,21 | plerumque seq. Subj. verbi: Gen. 22,14; መኑ፡ አነ፡ ከመ፡ እሑር፡ Ex. 3,11; Lev. 18,18; Num. 22,28; Jos. 10,14; Jos. 22,16; Jud. 14,3; 1 Reg. 3,11; 1 Reg. 15,29; 1 Reg. 17,43; 1 Reg. 20,1; 1 Reg. 22,8; 4 Reg. 5,7; Ps. 8,5; Job 10,6; Judith 5,23; ውኅድ፡ አንቲ፡ ከመ፡ ትኩኒ፡ Mich. 5,1; ከመ፡ ያድኅና፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ለኢየሩሳሌም፡ Jes. 36,20; Jer. 45,18; 4 Esr. 2,10; Hebr. 6,10; post verba efficiendi, ut: እሬስየከ፡ ከመ፡ ይፃእ፡ Gen. 17,6; Jes. 42,24. conj. finalis, ἵνα, ὅπως, ut et ከመ፡ ኢ፡ ne , ut ne : Gen. 1,15; Gen. 2,10; Gen. 2,19; Gen. 4,11; Gen. 42,2; Gen. 46,34; Ex. 8,6; Ex. 8,18; Ex. 9,29; Lev. 17,5; Ps. 9,14; Jon. 1,6; 2 Esr. 3,10; 1 Petr. 3,3; 1 Joh. 1,4; Rom. 3,19; Phil. 3,8; 1 Tim. 1,15; ከመ፡ ኢ፡ Ex. 7,14; Lev. 10,6; Deut. 19,6; Deut. 20,18; 1 Reg. 31,4; Ps. 16,6; Jes. 48,5; Jes. 48,9; Hez. 31,14; Apoc. 18,4; Apoc. 20,3. in specie post verba volendi, jubendi, rogandi, promittendi, sperandi, permittendi, cogendi, al., ut: አዘዘነ፡ ከመ፡ ንግበር፡ Deut. 6,4; ይቤ፡ ከመ፡ ይቅትልዎ፡ 1 Reg. 19,1; ተከሥተ፡ ሎቱ፡ ከመ፡ ይግበር፡ Kuf. 32; አደሞ፡ ከመ፡ ይግበር፡ 2 Par. 7,11; ቦኑ፡ እፈቅድ፡ ከመ፡ ይሙት፡ Hez. 18,23; አኀሥሥ፡ ከመ፡ እግበር፡ Kuf. 21; ኀለየ፡ ከመ፡ ይቅትል፡ Asc. Jes. 1,12; አስተብቍዕዎ፡ ከመ፡ ይልከፉ፡ Matth. 14,36; ይስእሉ፡ ከመ፡ ይኩኖሙ፡ Hen. 13,6; መሐለ፡ ከመ፡ የሀባ፡ Matth. 14,7; አሰፈወ፡ ከመ፡ Sap. 17,8; Jud. 2,3; vid. ተካየደ፡; ይሴፈዉ፡ ከመ፡ ይሕየዉ፡ Hen. 10,10; ትትአመን፡ ከመ፡ ያእቱ፡ Job 39,12; Ps. 26,19; Rom. 15,14; Hebr. 6,9; ኢያብሐ፡ ከመ፡ የአብሱ፡ Sir. 15,20; Num. 22,13; ኣጌብሮ፡ ከመ፡ ይስግድ፡ Asc. Jes. 5,8; ይደሉ፡ ከመ፡ ትስረዩ፡ 2 Cor. 2,7; ኢይከውኖ፡ ከመ፡ ይግባእ፡ Deut. 24,4; ይኄይሰከ፡ ከመ፡ ይትሀጐል፡ Matth. 5,29. post verba potentiae et impotentiae Hen. 93,11; Apoc. 11,6; ስእነ፡ ከመ፡ ይሴሲ፡ እሞ፡ Clem. f. 219; pavendi: አርመምኩ፡ ፈሪህየ፡ ከመ፡ እንግር፡ ዘእኄሊ፡ Job 32,7; ኢይደነግፁ፡ ከመ፡ ይፁርፉ፡ 2 Petr. 2,10; audendi: F.M. 3,5; ተኀበለ፡ ከመ፡ ይንሣእ፡ F.M. 3,5; incipiendi, repetendi: አኀዘ፡ ከመ፡ ይሕንጽ፡ 2 Par. 3,3; ኢይደግም፡ ከመ፡ እፈኑ፡ Hen. 10,22. etiam post ea verba, quae alias ከመ፡ cum Indic. postulant, ከመ፡ c. Subj. sequitur, si quidem significatur non quid sit vel fiat, sed quid fieri oporteat: ይእዜ፡ አእመርነ፡ ከመ፡ ንሰብሖ፡ (nobis eum celebrandum esse) Hen. 63,4; Hen. 58,5; ተፈሥሐ፡ ከመ፡ ይግበር፡ ({er freute sich zu thun}) Deut. 28,63; ተኀለየ፡ ውስተ፡ ልብከ፡ ከመ፡ ታሕንጽ፡ ሊተ፡ ቤተ፡ 2 Par. 6,8. ከመ፡ ኢ፡ ne post verba timendi, prohibendi: እፈርህ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይምጻእ፡ Gen. 32,12; Gen. 24,9; Sir. 29,7; Sir. 42,9; 2 Esr. 16,3; Gen. 47,18; Ex. 32,12; Kuf. p. 95 (seq. Indic.); መነንክዎ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይንግሥ፡ 1 Reg. 16,1; ከላእክኒ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይባእ፡ 1 Reg. 25,33; 1 Reg. 25,34; Act. 5,28; Matth. 12,16; ኢያበውሑ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይቅረብ፡ M.M. f. 169. ከመ፡ et ከመ፡ ኢ፡ est nota jussivi vel optativi: 1 Cor. 9,7; እኁክሙ፡ ከመ፡ ይኩን፡ ቅኑየ፡ Kuf. 43; ከመ፡ ኢታሕዝና፡ Tob. 10,12; Jud. 21,1. – Annotandum est, quod Lud. in lex. c. 392 affert: „particula haec repetita certitudinem aliquam significare videtur: ከመ፡ ከመ፡ ቀርበ፡ et mox ከመ፡ ከመ፡ በጽሐ፡ quod certo venisset “ Org. 4. – እምከመ፡, rarius ለእምከመ፡ et ለእመ፡ ከመ፡ [e qua forma illud እም፡ non praepositionem እምነ፡ sed conjunctionem conditionalem እመ፡ censendam esse satis elucet] conj. conditionalis et temporalis, frequentatissima, si (sed fere ubique inclinans ad significationes quum , quando , quoties , simulac ), rarius εἰ, ut Rom. 6,8; Rom. 8,17; Rom. 8,25, saepius ἐάν, (seq. Imperf.) ut: እምከመ፡ ታበውእ፡ si (i.e. quotiescumque ) offers Matth. 5,23; Rom. 10,9; ἐὰν μή Dan. 2,5; Dan. 2,6; seq. sententia nominali Matth. 6,22; Joh. 11,57; seq. Perf.: እምከመ፡ ገሰስኩ፡ si
tetigero Matth. 9,21; Matth. 21,24; Joh. 8,36; Joh. 12,32; Joh. 13,35; Rom. 7,2; 1 Thess. 3,8; 1 Reg. 20,9; Job 7,9; እምከመ፡ አንበርዎ፡ ἐὰν θῶσιν Jes. 46,7; Jes. 58,9; ለእምከመ፡ Rom. 4,5 ant. cum , quum , quando , quotiescumque , plerumque c. Perf. Ex. 33,9 (ὡς δ᾽ ἄν); ἡνίκα δ᾽ ἄν 2 Cor. 3,16; ἐκάθισας – μὴ ἀνοίξῃς Sir. 31,12; Num. 21,8; Num. 21,9 (ὅταν); እምከመ፡ እቤሎ፡ ἐν τῷ εἰπεῖν με Hez. 33,8; Hez. 33,14; 1 Reg. 16,16; እምከመ፡ ርእዩከ፡ ἰδόντες σε Job 38,17; ὁπότε ἐάν Tob. 7,11; ὅταν Jes. 30,15; Jes. 57,13; Tit. 3,12; ለእምከመ፡ ንዋየ፡ ረከብከ፡ ἐν χρήμασιν Sir. 37,6; ለእመ፡ ከመ፡ (v. ለእምከመ፡) ተጸነሰ፡ ἀπό ἐνδείας Sir. 20,21; 4 Esr. 6,51. quamdiu , donec , c. Perf., ἡνίκα ἄν Gen. 30,42; Jes. 55,6; simul ac , ubi vel ut primum : Gen. 12,12 (ὡς ἄν); Lev. 14,34; 2 Esr. 16,3; እምከመ፡ ሰምዑ፡ ἀκούσαντες Deut. 2,25; Job 14,10; ለእምከመ፡ ቦቱ፡ ዘገረሞ፡ Sir. 22,18; ἐν τῷ ἀποθανεῖν Sir. 10,11; Jes. 51,14; 4 Esr. 9,35; 4 Esr. 9,36; 4 Esr. 9,37; Matth. 21,40; saepius ubi Graecus καὶ consecutivum habet, ut: እምከመ፡ ሠረቀ፡ ፀሓይ፡ ያየብሶ፡ለሣዕር፡ ἀνέτειλε καὶ ἐξήρανε Jac.1,11; 1 Petr. 1,24; Nah. 3,17; Ps. 103,23; Sir. 30,9.
